entry.title: Director management page not accessible
entry.content:
The Director management page may not be accessible.

::: Resolved | 2021-02-13T00:06:39.038Z This issue has been resolved. :::

entry.title: Director inaccessible
entry.content:
Director may be inaccessible at this time. We are looking into the issue.

2021-02-12T22:19:14.819Z
Resolved

This issue has been resolved.

entry.title: Cluster maintenance
entry.content: The cluster may be inaccessible for a short period of time while maintenance is being conducted.

entry.title: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may not work
entry.content: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may result in a "Your access to submit messages to this e-mail system has been restricted" message.

entry.title: Director degraded performance
entry.content: Director may be laggy or slow during this time. We are looking into the issue.

entry.title: Temporary Cluster outage
entry.content: Launching jobs using Slurm or using Jupyterhub may fail.

entry.title: Database upgrades
entry.content:
We are upgrading the databases on both Ion and Director. During this period, Ion will be inaccessible, and Director sites' Postgres databases will not be accessible.

2020-12-23T18:30:00.000Z
Maintenance concluded

Maintenance has concluded on both Ion and Director.

entry.title: Storage Cluster Upgrades
entry.content: An upgrade of our storage cluster will be performed over Winter Break. Some slowdowns or periods of interruption is expected.
